author: AiTechEye
long_description:
The other gravity mods does not changing players gravity exactly how you want it from a command, so i made this one :-)
requires: ban  
command: /setgrav <name> <number>  

Default gravit: 1  
Half gravity: 0.5  
Extreamly high grav: 100 (not recmomanded)  
Very low gravity 0.01  
Extreamly low gravity 0.001 (let you jump over the cloads [not recmomanded])  
Anti gravity starts from -0.001  
and all other combinations...
name: setpgrav
short_description: Change players gravity exactly how you'd like using a command
title: Set Player Gravity
